channel.description: Recent content in Golang on coda.life

item.title: Fortunes on Slack
item.description: Introduction Have always enjoyed the UNIX fortunes program, ever since I was a wee newbie. If you aren’t familiar with it (sad), yes, its like a fortune cookie. Except that it can be more technical in nature but not always. It also has poems, quotations, and if enabled - offensive content. Often I will find a fortune, I’d like to share, and would simply make a snippet of my terminal.
